title: Game-Based Deep Learning Program for Social Problem Solving

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental understanding of social issues and educational field experience
context.additional_context: Enhancing game design and utilization competencies linked to social studies curricula for in-service secondary school teachers

learning_goals: Learners acquire the ability to design simulations that convert complex social issues into game mechanics.
Learners improve engagement by over 40% through gamification elements applied in a VR environment.
Learners demonstrate the competency to resolve conflicts arising during collaborative problem-solving using in-game feedback systems.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
